description.value: Sidereal Lep'ix have an affinity for the realms of the stars and the celestial bodies. Their mystical gifts are reminiscent of the grandeur of a starlit night and the pull of planets and moons as they dance above us. Wing patterns may include features such as glittering constellations, colorful nebulas, or concentric and intersecting ellipses, to name a few.

system.classDetails:
Sidereal Lep'ix Traits

  • Compatibility: Insectoid
  • Attribute Increase: Your Intelligence and Wisdom both increase by 1.
  • Sidereal Magic: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.SZB7LUSQ2DP1Z38K]{Sidereal Magic}
  • Twilight Messenger: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.5VBCE0TI5ROEEH8N]{Twilight Messenger}
  • Gravitational Interference: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ATC9IW4AOMA74635]{Gravitational Interference}
  • Languages: You can speak, read, and write Farspeak.
